title: Using OAuth2 RBAC in Quarkus
summary: This guide expounds on how to leverage OAuth2 tokens within a Quarkus application to secure Jakarta REST endpoints. It covers creating a secure application using the Elytron Security OAuth2 extension, setting up properties, and securing and testing endpoints. Practical steps for creating projects, integration and securing endpoints with role-based access control (RBAC) are detailed. Includes references for additional configurations and testing with Wiremock.
